name: Gorilla Tough & Clear; Double Sided Mounting Tape; Weatherproof; 1" x 60"; Clear; (Pack of 1)
short_description: Crystal Clear: This permanently clear double sided tape won't yellow over time; making it the perfect window hanging adhesive to match your clear windows
Super Strong: Where typical fasteners won’t work; this strong; double sided wall tape can hold up to 15 lbs; keeping objects firmly attached to any surface
Weatherproof: Industrial strength; heavy duty double sided tape clearly adheres and permanently bonds objects to almost any indoor or outdoor surfaces
Permanent; Two-Way Bond: This adhesive mounting tape bonds to smooth or rough surfaces in just 60 seconds; including glass; plastic; metal; wood; & more
Smooth or Rough Surfaces: Heavy duty double sided tape fastens to both rough and smooth surfaces alike; perfect for your next DIY wall mounting project
product_description: Gorilla Tough & Clear Mounting Tape is a clear double sided tape that mounts in an instant; for a long-lasting; weatherproof bond. The crystal clear two sided tape won’t yellow over time; and holds up to 15 pounds. Gorilla Tough & Clear Mounting Tape is perfect for indoor and outdoor projects and sticks to smooth and rough surfaces. Completing DIY projects are easy with this tough; double sided tape 1 pack. Mount; build; and repair for a perfect finish; every time. Directions: Apply tape to back of object vertically; allowing for even distribution of weight. Avoid touching surfaces of the tape. Note: Apply 4” of tape per 1lb of weight. Cut the tape and press to secure the tape to object. Remove clear liner and align objects to desired placement. Press firmly; as Gorilla Mounting Tape conforms to the surface and creates a strong; permanent bond. Once Gorilla Mounting Tape is used to mount an object; it is meant to be held in place permanently; and not be removed. The package contains 1; 60 inch; double sided strips of tape designed for walls and windows alike. Each 60" strip of two sided tape heavy duty sticks to almost any indoor or outdoor surface. Follow the Gorilla link at the top of this page to see other quality products from the Gorilla Glue Company.

name: Extra Large Double Sided Tape Heavy Duty Removable 1.18 Inch x 160 Inch, Clear & Tough Nano Tape, Multipurpose Mounting Tape Picture Hanging Strips Adhesive for Poster Carpet
short_description: 【Strong Adhesion】: Our heavy duty double sided tape is made of premium acrylic gel via advanced nano tech with great holding power. Getting your mounting activities done fast and securely without drilling and nails, a must have for dorm room essentials.

【Removable and No Residue】: Our removable double sided tape heavy duty leaves no sticky residue and won't damage most surfaces upon removal such as glass, metal, plastic, marble, wood. No need to clean the mess like other kind of adhesive, totally renter friendly.

【Weatherproof】:Our heavy duty adhesive double sided tape with high temperature and solvent resistance will stick to almost any smooth surfaces and works perfectly indoor and outdoor. It's perfect for mounting or repairing items such as pictures hanging strips, frames, festival decorations, LED plates, nameplates, posters, hooks, shelves, phone holders, carpets, flowerpots, power sockets, DIY items, home & office decor and so on. Perfect for classroom, college dorm room decor.

【Easy Storage and Dirt-free】: With our innovative protective PC holder, our strong viscosity double-sided tape won't stick to any other things when lying down, making it easier for storage. It can be easily cut to any size and mounted on wall for convenient hanging.

【Caution to Use】: Please be cautious when using the tape on painted wall due to strong adhesion and the nature of painted wall, which may peel off painted wall upon removal. Please keep the mounting surface dry, clean and free of oil when mounting to make instant and permanent bond and get great water and moisture resistance ability. Applying the tape vertically on the items can make stronger bonds.

short_description: 【Premium Double Sided Tape】Multi-purpose double sided craft tape made of high quality double-sided adhesive and 0.08mm(80μ) thick translucent cotton paper layer, robust and safe. Six different sizes of double sides tape can be easily selected in different widths according to the different objects to be taped. The double stick tape can be easily teared by hand.

【Strong Adhesive Craft Tape】High tack but thin, and translucent double sided tape allows you to quickly and easily bond a variety of similar and dissimilar materials together. The double tape can be used on glass, plastic, fabric, paper, wood, metal, tile and more. Warm Tips - For better adhesion, please keep the surface of the object clean and smooth before pasting double face tape.

【Widely Applications】Our two sides tape is widely used in daily life, schools, offices and industries. This double sided sticky tape with strong adhesive back is great for DIY craft projects, scrapbooking, origami, gift wrapping, wallpaper, documents, stamps, mounting photos, card making supplies and more. Scrapbook tape can be easily torn by hand without the use of other tools. The two sided tape is a good helper in daily life.

【Easy to Use】Cut or tear the double photo tape to the required length, then stick to the item and press firmly, peel off the top layer to expose the adhesive, and finish by placing another item on top of the adhesive. The double side tape is super sticky and easy to make two objects stick together firmly, and the craft tape is also easy to remove and peel off by hand, leaving no sticky residue after removal.

【Package Included】You will get 6 rolls of thin double sided tape. Included 6 size: 5mm/0.2in, 6m/0.24in, 8/0.3in, 10mm/0.4in, 12mm/0.47in, 15mm/0.6in; The length of each paper tape is 20 meters/22 yards/66 feet. product_description: Decorate and design effortlessly with Scotch-Mount Multi-Purpose Gel Tape, the ultimate solution for heavy or light mounting. This clear, removable mounting tape is perfect for DIY designers and decorators who love to create stunning wall features. This Scotch double sided tape is designed to hold up to 20 lbs on a variety of hard surfaces, including metal, tempered glass, tile, painted wood, smooth stone, brick, vinyl siding, and acrylic. It’s not recommended for delicate surfaces such as painted drywall or wallpaper. It’s perfect for hanging heavy frames and mirrors as well as lightweight posters and wall decor. In addition to mounting heavy objects, this clear mounting tape is great for decorating and other creative endeavors, providing significant holding power while also allowing for removal. This double sided tape for heavy duty applications comes in a convenient 1.18″ x 118″ roll, providing ample length for all your mounting needs. Choose Scotch-Mount Multi-Purpose Gel Tape for all your decorating and mounting projects, and let your creativity shine with this versatile, strong, and removable solution.

"Heavy weight and fragile objects are not recommended".

Remove without leaving residue: Before removal, apply heat from a hairdryer to reduce the adhesive's stickiness. Then pull it off horizontally using dental floss or fishing line. If the adhesive has been in place for a long time, residue may remain. This can be removed with alcohol or a specialized adhesive remover.
